overview:
Orange County Certified Notary Services

Jeovanny Pacheco Mobile Notary 2-U Residential and Investment Properties 15141 E Whittier Blvd Suite 420 Whittier, CA, 90603 jeovannypacheco@earthlink.net Cell: 562-716-5064 Fax 562-699-2301â€¢ PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE Notary Public and Certified Mobile Notary Signing Agent. Se Habla Espanol For all of your San Fernando & San Gabriel Valley, Los Angeles, Long Beach and Orange County Areas you can count on our mobile notary services to get the job done. Your personal notary is only a phone call away! We travel to your place of Business or Residence. We specialize in Refinance Loans, Home Equity Lines of Credit; Reverse Mortgages, Sale and Purchase Transactions, Commercial Transactions, Construction Loans, Foreclosures, Depositions and Living Trusts. We are highly detail-oriented with strong organizational skills as well as polite, proficient, professional and deadline oriented. Minimum Rate Range Per Loan Signing: $90 to $250 Call us to set up a fees and SIGNING Appointment Today! I have been in Real Estate for nearly 15 years. I specialize in residential homes, but I also have extensive experience in 1031 tax deferred exchanges, short pay-off sales, foreclosure properties, and multi-family homes apartment houses. I will use my many years of mortgage banking experience, and real estate sales to ensure the bet possible results, both for your clients and mine. I am full-time Professional Real Estate Agent available to you seven days a week, subject to current appointments. Laser Printer(s), High Speed Internet, Fax Machine, Field Services, Bonded & Insured, E&O Insurance. E-Doc’s. E-Sign, Lab-Top, E-Card.

CONTACT INFO:

Jeovanny Pacheco, Mobile Notary 2-U Cell: 562-716-5064 15141 E Whittier Blvd Ste 420 Whittier, CA 90603

Click To Email Me http://www.jeovannypacheco.com/ Company Profile

HIGHLIGHTS National Notary Association over 10 year’s service and member NNA Certified Signing Agent Preferred List and Background Check. Pacific West Associations of Realtors over 18 year’s service and member. Re/Max Realtor Hall Of Fame Award for 2009. Re/Max Realtor Executive Club Awards. Re/Max Realtor 100% Club Awards. Cambridge Who’s Who Award

OTHER INFORMATION Looking for Escrow Companies, Financial Companies, Corporate Office, and Loan Officers, which need the services of a Mobile Notary Signing Agent. Covering areas; Los Angeles, Orange County areas, San Bernardino County.
